title: Analyze Pipeline Inspection Gauge (PIG) Data
description: An integrity engineer analyzes data from a recent PIG run to check for corrosion or defects inside a natural gas pipeline.

tasks.description: Ingest and process the high-resolution data from the intelligent PIG tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully loads and structures the inspection data.

tasks.description: Run an analysis algorithm to detect and classify anomalies, such as metal loss (corrosion) or dents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Algorithm identifies three areas of minor metal loss and one small dent.

tasks.description: Assess the severity of the identified defects against industry standards to determine if immediate repair is needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: System concludes that all identified defects are within acceptable limits and only require monitoring.
